title: Wall Street Carries Big Expectations After Best Run Since 2009
description: The new year opened much as the last one ended, with markets rising, Wall Street confidence intact and little sign the forces that powered 2025 have run their course. What’s less clear is how long the cross-asset synchrony can last.
content: The new year opened much as the last one ended, with markets rising, Wall Street confidence intact and little sign the forces that powered 2025 have run their course. What’s less clear is how long the cross-asset synchrony can last.
